Title: Our Signature Dishes

Dishes.Name: Fresh & Healthy
Dishes.Description: Light wraps and bowls built around crisp greens, lean proteins, and house-made dressings. We use the freshest produce and whole ingredients so every bite is nourishing and satisfyingâ€”perfect for a quick lunch or a light dinner any day.

Dishes.Subtitle: CURATED SELECTION
Dishes.Name: Grilled Specials
Dishes.Description: Tender grilled meats and kebabs, marinated in our secret blends and charred to perfection over the flame. Served with fresh herbs, warm flatbreads, and your choice of sides. A celebration of fire, flavour, and tradition.

Dishes.Subtitle: CURATED SELECTION
Dishes.Name: Garden Salads
Dishes.Description: Hand-picked greens, seasonal vegetables, and house dressings made in-house daily. Fresh, colourful, and prepared with care for every plate. A true taste of the garden, from field to table.
